definition: whip or lash/to flog/to whip/conductor's baton/segmented iron weapon (old)/penis (of animal, served as food)
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: This colonic mucosal surface is erythematous because of the enormous infestation by Trichuris organisms ( whipworms ).
sentences.chinese: 鞭虫大量侵袭使结肠粘膜表面出现红斑。

definition: trematoda/fluke/trematode worm, approx 6000 species, mostly parasite, incl. on humans
ascariasis/infectation by parasitic roundworm Ascaris lumbricoides
Giardia lamblia protozoan parasite that inhabits the gut

pinyin: gou1 duan1 luo2 xuan2 ti3 bing4

definition: gonococcus/Neisseria gonorrhoeae, the pathogen causing gonorrhea
Gram negative (bacteria that do not retain Gram stain, often the more dangerous kind)
